content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of coal, and my inventory now reflects:
# - 2 stone bricks
# - 10 coal
# - 8 stones
# - 5 iron ore

# With the coal now available, I can proceed to smelt the remaining iron ore into iron plates. 
# I will insert the 5 iron ore into the stone furnace along with some coal to fuel the smelting process.

furnace_info = get_entity(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Position(-5.0, 5.0))  # Get the furnace info again.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, target=furnace_info, quantity=5)  # Insert the remaining 5 iron ore into the stone furnace.
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, target=furnace_info, quantity=5)  # Insert 5 units of coal into the stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after inserting. 
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the updated state of entities.
